entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
